pages.text: For starters, you need something to interact with time. Luckily there are some common items that can already do exactly that.$(p)$(item)Redstone$() ticks, $(item)Amethysts$() grow, the $(item)Clock$() checks and $(item)Bone Meal$() accelerates.
The $(item)Diamond$() is needed to bind these different concepts together to a $(item)Timey Wimey$().
